Name: Prism Ruff
LongDescription: Protects against weather damage. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Eevee.   You can get a Prism Ruff at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: Eevee Tail, Eevee Card, and Evolve Charm. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
